description: The construction of a garage for up to 3 cars on that part of the vehicle access way rear of Nos. 37a 38 38a and 39 Canonbury Square with access to Canonbury Road and erection of a new gate; and change of use of part of the access way r/o No.37 Canonbury Square to residential garden and the construction of a garden wall.
decision_conditions: The erection of the garage on this restricted backland site would be an unsatisfactory form of development which would be out of scale and charcter with and detract from the secluded nature of this part of the designated Canonbury Conservation Area and the quiet enjoyment by occupiers of nearby residential properties, by reason of the effect on their outlook and the noise, fumes and additional traffic that would be generated by the garage.
